headline: Exxon Mobil (XOM) Ascends While Market Falls: Some Facts to Note

headline: ExxonMobil CEO talks oil supply amid Iran-Israel conflict
summary: Amid the ongoing tensions between Israel and Iran, ExxonMobil's CEO says there's enough spare capacity to offset any Iranian oil that comes off the market.
